Blueprint CLT has gotten to know Charlotte's two Mayoral Candidates this week, Kenny Smith and Vi Lyles. They have both been gracious with their time, showing up and answering questions, along with asking questions to get to know us as well.

Each candidate offered their vision for the Queen City with SHARE Charlotte this morning at our Blueprint office. They also made note of the importance of Millennial involvement in the civic process yesterday at The Charlotte Observer's young professionals group, 35Below.
We all have a duty to help Charlotte move the needle forward! Best of luck to you both in the election!!
James B. Mathis, III , Becky Thompson
Charlotte, North Carolina Area, United States

summary: Over the past 5 years, I have helped numerous success oriented individuals start, build and continue to grow successful client focused financial planning practice.  Consolidated Planning Inc. has an uncommon approach to helping individuals build a successful practice that is valuable and educational to the client.  Our firm will develop new advisors in the industry and we help experienced advisors get better and have a more well rounded practice.  I am interested in finding individuals who are ethical, self motivated and want to build a business helping others. Our mission is to help clients win the highest stakes game of their lives, to build a robust, reliable complete and impenetrable Balance Sheet.   We accomplish this by being counselors, educators and coaches of personal financial matters.  We fulfill our mission by being the most professional service providers in our industry.Please contact me at 980-235-7893 or by email beckythompson@cplanning.com if you want to learn about opportunities with Consolidated Planning, Inc.Visit our website at www.cplanning.com
